item.description:
UPDATED! Meeting time:  The movie is at 7:40 pm. We will meet at 7:10. If this effects your ability to attend, please update your RSVP. If you will be late or change your RSVP to NO after I have closed RSVPs (about 2 hours before the event), please call 978-857-3734.

Tickets: I will have not discount coupons. Everyone will be responsible for their own ticket.

After the movie, those who want to are welcome to go out to a local restaurant to chat.

Film description:

  • A stranger with no memory of his past stumbles into the hard desert town of Absolution. The people of Absolution don't welcome strangers, and nobody makes a move on its streets unless ordered by the iron-fisted Colonel Dolarhyde (Ford). But Absolution is about to experience fear it can scarcely comprehend as the desolate city is attacked by marauders from the sky. Now, the stranger they rejected is their only hope for salvation. As this gunslinger slowly starts to remember who he is and where he's been, he realizes he holds a secret that could give the town a fighting chance against the alien force.
  • Cast: Daniel Craig, Olivia Wilde, Harrison Ford, Sam Rockwell, Paul Dano
  • Director: Jon Favreau
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby to the right of the ticket booth.
item.name: Cowboys & Aliens
